title: The Death penalty?
brief_description: In Britain death is the penalty for only a few specified crimes, but there is still a great deal of controversy about capital punishment. Here the evidence for and against is discussed by the Public Hangman, prominent churchmen, chiefs of police and murderers themselves. Relatives of victims also express their views.
